manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LG HDR 4K UHD Smart TV with Deco Gear Home Theater Bundle LG HDR 4K UHD Smart TV with Deco Gear Home Theater Bundle Deco Mount 37"-100" TV Wall Mount Bracket Bundle w/ 2 HDMI Cables, Spray Bottle and Wipe Deco Gear 60W Soundbar with Subwoofer - Premium 2.1 Channel Audio - Wireless Connectivity SurgePro 6 NT 750 Joule 6-Outlet Surge Adapter with Night Light - 33208 At Beach Camera we pride ourselves on providing the best TV Bundles at the best prices. All of the items we include in our bundles are brand new and of the highest quality. They provide you with everything you need to take your Smart TV to the next level! As an Authorized Dealer all TVs purchased from us come sealed in their original box & includes Full Manufacturer Provided Protection

BUNDLE INCLUDES Deco Gear 60W Soundbar with Subwoofer - Premium 2.1 Channel Audio - Wireless Connectivity Enjoy premium dynamic sound thanks to two 2.5” front-facing high fidelity 20W speakers and two built-in subwoofer ports in combination with booming bass and resonance provided by the dedicated 4” 20W subwoofer box. The included 20W subwoofer connects to your soundbar wirelessly making placement or concealment a simple process Installation Options A wall mounting kit is included with every sound bar so you can more easily build your custom home theater experience. The unit can also be placed within entertainment consoles or on shelves. Sleek Modern Appearance No matter the brand of TV, this tastefully designed speaker system will fit with any home theater setup. Remote Included Enables simple operation from a distance with ability to control playback from your couch. A Variety of Input Options This soundbar accepts a multitude of audio inputs: 2 x AUX, Optical, and HDMI ARC. Don’t sweat having the correct cables, this soundbar has you covered. 37" - 100" TV Mount, 2 Deco Gear 6FT 4K HDMI Cables, and Cleaning Spray Bottle with Microfiber Wipe The Deco Mount 37” - 100” Tilting Wall Mount Bracket safely and securely mounts your flat panel TV. This sturdy flat-screen TV bracket supports up to 132 lb and is compatible with the VESA mounting standards of 100 x 100 and 600 x 400. It tilts 15 degrees up and 15 degrees down for more comfortable viewing, better angles, and even reducing glare. These truly universal wall mounts included every type of bolt you would need to mount any TV brand. For more info, see below. Features: Supports 100x100, 800x400 VESA patterns Extends from as little as 2.68" from the wall Supports measuring televisions 37" to 100" and weighing up to 132 lbs. Tilts up to 15° up and 15° down Stanley SurgePro 6 NT 750 Joule 6-Outlet Surge Adapter with Night Light - 33208 The Stanley Surge Pro features 6 outlets and 750 joules of surge protection It also has a built in night light with automatic light sensor. Convert Duplex Wall Outlet into 6 Grounded Outlets750 Joule Protection - Perfect For Home or OfficeBuilt-In Darkness Sensing Night LightWhite in ColorCompliant with new UL safety standard UL498-A

OVERVIEW: Dive into a world of free content, thanks to over 300+ free LG Channels and personalized recommendations for everyone you share the remote with. ENGINEERED TO AMAZE α5 Gen 5 AI Processor 4K Enhance your picture and sound with AI from the a5 Gen 5 AI Processor 4K webOS 22 YOU, ME, & MAYBE THE DOG Customize your viewing experience with separate accounts and personalized recommendations for every member of your family Ultimate Streaming BINGE-WORTHY STREAMING STARTS HERE Find your faves fast with built-in access to Netflix, Prime Video, Apple TV app, Disney+, HBO Max* and instant access to over 300+ free LG Channels with everything from comedy to movies to sports LG Channels THE “AND MORE” YOU’LL LOVE Discover something new or find your faves with free access to programming on over 300+ LG Channels Game Optimizer UP YOUR GAME Make it the best gaming experience by quickly adjusting all your game settings in one location

Down to the finest detail Transform your regular content into 4K for sharper definition and detail, even on our biggest screens A Perfect Fit LG UHD TVs are designed slim and sleek with a minimal bezel so they’ll match your space perfectly Morning, Noon, or Night No matter how bright or how dark your room is, you’ll experience just the right brightness with our AI Brightness Control that automatically adjusts your screen to match the room Up Your Game Make it the best gaming experience by quickly adjusting all your game settings in one location 4K Upscaled Minimal Bezel Unlimited Entertainment Game Optimizer & Dashboard
